content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)

### Boiler at position(-4.5, 23.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -4.5, 23.0)

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)

### Lab at position(-10, -10)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -10, -10)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is placed directly adjacent to a water source to avoid placement errors.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Check for any placement blockages before attempting to connect pipes. Ensure that the path between the two entities is clear.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify the position of the entity you are trying to retrieve. Ensure that the entity exists at the specified coordinates before attempting to access it.

### Errors when checking power connections
- Ensure that the entities requiring power are correctly connected to a power source. Check for any disconnections in the power network.
